article.title: Unisys to Help Police Use Digital Imagery as New Weapon in Law Enforcement, Crime Prevention
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The New South Wales Police Force has selected Unisys Australia for a three-year deal to implement and provide maintenance services for an end-to-end digital imagery management system to manage and protect digital images taken by forensic teams as well as images and video footage received from the public. The contract has an estimated value of approximately AU$6 million (US$4.75 million).
